text: from the Lord of the heavens and the earth read rabbi ‘from the Lord of’ or rabbu ‘He is the Lord of’ and all that is between them the Compassionate One likewise read rahmāni or rahmānu or read rahmānu with rabbi for the preceding Whom exalted be He they that is creatures will not be able to address that is to say not one of them will be able to address Him for fear of Him
